text: Brigi Rafini (born 7 April 1953) is a Nigerien politician. He was the Prime Minister of Niger from 2011 to 2021.Le Premier ministre, M Brigi Rafini : un homme d'une grande expérience politique à la tête du gouvernement . Oumarou Moussa, Le Sahel (Niamey), 2011-04-11. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Niger
title: Brigi Rafini
